metadata.title: CVE-2020-1893 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient boundary checks when decoding JSON in TryParse reads out ofbounds memory, potentially leading to DOS. This issue affects HHVM 4.45.0,4.44.0, 4.43.0, 4.42.0, 4.41.0, 4.40.0, 4.39.0, versions between 4.33.0 and4.38.0 (inclusive), versions between 4.9.0 and 4.32.0 (inclusive), andversions prior to 4.8.7.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
